name: The Red Strings Club
description: The Red Strings Club is a cyberpunk narrative experience about fate and happiness featuring the extensive use of pottery, bartending and impersonating people on the phone to take down a corporate conspiracy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10  x64 Processor: Intel Pentium D 915 (2800 MHz), AMD Athlon 64 4000+ (2600 MHz) or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600GS (256 MB) or Radeon HD 2600 PRO (256 MB) Storage: 400 MB available space
